# Sunday School Dashboard - Project Setup

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Scaffold the Project - Backend and Frontend structures created
- [x] Customize the Project - Full implementation complete with all features
- [x] Migrate to PostgreSQL - Converted from MongoDB to PostgreSQL with Prisma
- [x] Install Required Extensions - No special extensions required
- [ ] Compile the Project - Run `npm install` in both directories (backend done)
- [ ] Setup Database - Install PostgreSQL and run migrations
- [ ] Launch the Project - Start PostgreSQL, backend server, then frontend
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete - Comprehensive docs created

## Technology Stack

**Backend:** Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, Prisma ORM
**Frontend:** React, Vite, Recharts
**Database:** PostgreSQL (local or Neon/Supabase/Railway)

## Quick Start

1. Install PostgreSQL or use cloud provider (Neon recommended)
2. Configure DATABASE_URL in backend/.env
3. Run `npm run prisma:migrate` in backend folder
4. Run `npm run dev` in both backend and frontend folders

See SETUP_INSTRUCTIONS.md for detailed steps!
